features: Ideal Baby Shower Gift - If you are looking for baby registry items, our baby hand and footprint kit is an ideal choice! It captures cute memories and includes all you need, no additional purchases required to complete this Duo Baby Keepsake Frame.

Personalized Photo Frame - Our baby footprint kit comes with bonus acrylic paint, paint brush and name/date printing kit. Customize it to your liking and present it as a thoughtful keepsake newborn baby gift for gender reveals and birth announcement.

100% Safe Food-Grade Clay - Our baby picture frame features 100% baby-safe air-dry clay, perfect for preserving your baby prints. Our premium material ensures durability, the baby hand and footprint maker will look flawless for years to come.

Tailored for Pet Lovers - This versatile baby frame handprint kit doubles as a paw print kit, capturing cherished moments from your baby's early years to paw prints of your beloved dog or cat. An exclusive baby imprint kit for all your loved ones.

Sturdy Wood Frame, Real Glass Cover - Our baby handprint footprint keepsake kit maintains its pristine condition for years to come. It’s a lovely, everlasting newborn keepsake for your baby room decor. A must-have newborn baby essentials.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A Classic Keepsake - and Beyond Craft the first chapter of your baby's journey with the KeaBabies Duo Baby Hand and Footprint Keepsake Kit. Featuring a sleek wooden frame, this keepsake is more than just a decoration—it's a celebration of love and growth in your home. An heirloom of precious memories that lasts a lifetime.

Why We Made This Best Baby Gift: Present A thoughtful baby gift goes a long way. This all-inclusive craft kit comes with everything, including paint, personalization tools, and a kraft gift box—no additional purchase required. A classic baby keepsake gift to be remembered for a lifetime. Clay Finish: Smooth Handcrafted wooden frame, protected by a durable glass cover—ensuring your baby's imprints are preserved for a lifetime. Tiny moments may be fleeting, but a quality keepsake lasts a lifetime.

Quality: Exceptional Discover the joy of crafting with our baby-safe air-dry clay. It's not just easy to knead and imprint; it also dries to a perfect smooth finish in an elegant off-white shade, preserving your baby's tiny imprints with remarkable precision. Decor: Masterpiece More than a nursery decor—it's a statement of your unique style and a testament to the love that fills your home. Your Duo Baby Hand and Footprint Keepsake Frame is set to be a centerpiece of your baby's nursery or home.

Craft Level: Effortless Prepare 1. Cut out baby's name. 2. Knead and set clay. Imprint 1. Wash the baby's hands and feet. 2. Press and hold gently to imprint. Personalize 1. Stamp with the name or birth date. 2. Air-dry for a day before painting. Frame 1. Insert your favorite photo. 2. Frame it for display on the wall or table-top.
A Cherished Keepsake Previous page Next page

Specifications What's Inside Wooden frame with durable glass cover, 3 frame cut-outs, baby-safe air dry clay, alphabet stamps and holder, wooden roller, acrylic paint, paint brush, double-sided tape Clay Type Baby-safe, food-grade air-dry clay. Not for ingestion. Imprint Size Suitable for newborns, babies, toddlers, infants 0 to 18 months old, dog paws, and cat paws Special Instructions Add olive oil if the clay is too hard to knead. Suitable For Newborns, Babies, Infants, Toddlers, Pets, Dogs, Cats Gift-ready Beautifully packaged in a kraft gift box Gender Unisex, baby boys, baby girls Gift-Ready Beautifully packaged in kraft gift box Best Uses Baby handprints, baby footprints, pet paw prints, dog paw prints, cat paw prints, baby hand and footprints kit, baby keepsake kit Gift Occasions Baby gifts, baby shower gift, gender reveal gifts, baby announcements, baby registry gifts, new parents gifts, grandma gifts, Mother's Day gifts, Father's Day gifts, grandparents gifts, Christmas gifts, Thanksgiving gifts, new baby gift

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Being a first time mom I was trying to do all these little things to have keepsakes. This product is so cute. It was very easy to use and looks great in the babies nursery

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my nursery
reviews.reviewText: It’s a perfect addition to any nursery. Made really well. Beautiful color. Easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to make, thoughtful gift
reviews.reviewText: I got this to make a first Father’s Day frame for my husband, not realizing he had made me one for Mother’s Day. This frame comes with a letter holder to imprint the letters in the clay. This is essential!! It keeps the letters even and readable. It was pretty easy to use, a little time consuming to cut all the letters off. You will want to trim the letters close to the plastic border or they won’t fit in the holder.The clay was very moldable and was not dried out at all. You will probably need a second person to help wrangle your baby to get a decent impression (but if you mess up you can just reroll it and try again). The clay didn’t have a super chemically smell and the frame is so cute. I love it and it’s a very thoughtful gift that we will have for our lifetime. I will probably buy another to get paw prints from my dog.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love these for my babies (three now) but don’t use the “stamps” they give you for the name/date. It just ruins the clay.The clay hardens pretty quickly so be careful on that one. Once you place your baby’s prints in, immediately write their name and date.But. All in all I still enjoyed this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It was definitely difficult to get the print itself because my daughter was less than a month old and not use to being touched and having pressure on her hands or feet, but we got it done.I am thoroughly happy with the end result. I would highly recommend this purchase for any sentimental parent.The clay was easy to manipulate but I don't recommend the roller at all. Just use your hands and put pressure down on it. There is some curvatures from your hand but much less noticeable then the rolling pin marks which become more prominent. Also, I didn't have any cracks and I believe that is because of the pressure I put down on the clay and the amount of time I took kneeding the clay.I also recommend painting the negative space as if you paint the prints themselves you lose the indentations and wrinkles of the hands and feet, as the paint helps even things out. Case in point the negative space doesn't look bad at all, in my opinion, when it comes to different levels of dimension.Hope this helps people! I have the original before I painted the negative space to help with that decision.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great gift or momento
reviews.reviewText: Got two of these as gifts for each of our moms. We put one handprint from each of our twins in the frames. The first set did need redone once or twice, but once you get the amount of pressure needed, a quality handprint is left! My best advice is to try your best to push down on the hand or foot pretty firmly and evenly. I placed my whole hand over the back of my boys' hands and pushed down into the clay. We opted not to do the painting portion and the Grandma's loved them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great purchase and super fast delivery!
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for one last gift for my daughter. This arrived overnight, basically within hours and is more than I hoped for. Great quality, everything I need including double sided tape. Ty for helping me find a gift that will be treasured for a life time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best baby shower gift

reviews.reviewText: Great for memories! Super easy to use!
Würde ich jederzeit wieder kaufen. Einfache Handhabung und tolles Ergebnis.
Comprato come regalo per la prima festa dei nonni. Facile da usare, molto bello il risultato finale e i nonni hanno apprezzato tantissimo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good quality but a bit pricey. Easy to do. Overall happy with the purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 18, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Lovely product as it looks really nice and the frame is good quality. The clay dried out too fast so was hard to get a good imprint with a 12 week old and one of the prints is creased. The paint we received was completely dry so we were also unable to paint it.
